name: getLongviewSubscription
description: Get the Longview plan details as a single `LongviewSubscription` object for the provided subscription ID. This is a public endpoint and requires no authentication.

subscriptionId.description: The Longview Subscription to look up.

$block: A Longview Subscription represents a tier of Longview service you can subscribe to.

$ul: **clients_included**: The number of Longview Clients that may be created with this Subscription tier.
**id**: The unique ID of this Subscription tier.
**label**: A display name for this Subscription tier.
**price**: Pricing information about this Subscription tier.
**hourly**: The hourly price, in US dollars, for this Subscription tier.
**monthly**: The maximum monthly price in US Dollars for this Subscription tier. You will never be charged more than this amount per month for this subscription.
